name: CubeCube
description:
With the sunrise again to the land, CubeCube is respawn, as he remember, CubeCube has to make a decision about a creatures.
You are going to help CubeCube discorver the relic and unlock the seals at the end of the big chain.


CubeCube is a challenging action-adventure game.

In this game, the players are going to confront the powerful ancient creatures.



The players can design CubeCube’s attack action with their own style.



Extraordinary attack equipments can be constituted to support CubuCube in the journey of discovery.


Exploring the past by using CubeCube’s backtracking ability.


No matters how hard the battles get, Cube Cube will never give up and keep going to accomplish the mission.

Notice:
CubeCube has using Kuwahara filter in Postprocess, if you do not like it, you can turn off Kuwahara filter in Graphic setting.

Kuwahara filter ON


Kuwahara filter OFF
